tags.name: hal-9000
tags.description:
`hal-9000`

Events:

  * `hal-9000-online` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - Start automatically

  * `enabled` {`boolean`} - Status of listening

  * `commands` - Commands to listen for and take action on

  * `responds-to` {`string`} - The name that HAL 9000 should respond to.

  * `debug` {`boolean`} - Debug mode for annyang

  * `pitch` {`number`} - Pitch of speech

  * `rate` {`number`} - Rate of speech

  * `language` {`string`} - Language of the speaker

Properties:

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - Start automatically

  * `enabled` {`boolean`} - Status of listening

  * `commands` - Commands to listen for and take action on

  * `respondsTo` {`string`} - The name that HAL 9000 should respond to.

  * `debug` {`boolean`} - Debug mode for annyang

  * `pitch` {`number`} - Pitch of speech

  * `rate` {`number`} - Rate of speech

  * `language` {`string`} - Language of the speaker

attributes.name: commands
attributes.description:
`commands` - Commands to listen for and take action on

Property: commands

Default: [object Object]

attributes.name: responds-to
attributes.description:
